javadoc:
This interface represents the main entry point into an object which
 stores all information relating to a single data type archive.

methods.javadoc:
Gets the default pointer size as it may be stored within the data type archive.
@return default pointer size.
methods.name: getDefaultPointerSize
methods.comment: Gets the default pointer size as it may be stored within the data type archive.

methods.name: getCreationDate
methods.comment:
Returns the creation date of this data type archive.
 existed, then Jan 1, 1970 is returned.

return.comment: the creation date of this data type archive

methods.javadoc:
Get the data type archive changes since the last save as a set of addresses.
@return set of changed addresses within program.
methods.name: getChanges
methods.comment: Get the data type archive changes since the last save as a set of addresses.

return.comment: set of changed addresses within program.

methods.name: setChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state this data type archive as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

methods.name: setObjChanged
methods.comment:
Mark the state of a data type archive as having changed and generate
 the event.  Any or all parameters may be null.

params.name: affectedObj
params.comment: object that is the subject of the event

params.name: oldValue
params.comment:
original value or an Object that is related to
 the event

params.name: newValue
params.comment:
new value or an Object that is related to the
 the event

methods.javadoc:
Invalidates any caching in a data type archive.
 NOTE: Over-using this method can adversely affect system performance.
methods.name: invalidate
methods.comment:
Invalidates any caching in a data type archive.
 NOTE: Over-using this method can adversely affect system performance.

name: DataTypeArchive
comment:
This interface represents the main entry point into an object which
 stores all information relating to a single data type archive.

fields.javadoc: Name of data type archive information property list
fields.name: DATA_TYPE_ARCHIVE_INFO
fields.comment: Name of data type archive information property list

fields.javadoc: Name of data type archive settings property list
fields.name: DATA_TYPE_ARCHIVE_SETTINGS
fields.comment: Name of data type archive settings property list
